name: The Ninja's Ending
description:
Description:

This is a magical first person shooter in which you level up your attacks by destroying the ninjas that have taken over your rightful city!

Controls:

WSAD / ARROWS - Move

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Tab - Release Mouse To Click Buttons

Esc - Leave Vehicle

Disclaimer:

This game was made for the 4th Krass Jam... I had the theme An FPS where you drive cars with ninjas with unpredictable powers. However I still intend on continuing this project. 

I would highly recommend you check out the other contestants from the 4th Krass Jam. You can find this here.
